info.title: Save the bone
info.welcomeText: It is a privilege to welcome you to the Balkan Osstem osseointegration meeting 2026 (BOOM 26), to be held in the beautiful multicultural city of Sarajevo from 00-00 Month 2026.
info.description: In Sarajevo, we will gather at a time of rapid change in science, technology, and society. Dentistry must not only keep pace with these changes but help shape them. This Meeting will provide an exceptional platform to explore the latest research, innovations, and clinical practices, while also engaging in meaningful dialogue about the future of our profession.

implants.title: Long Osstem implants in posterior maxilla
implants.speaker: Prof. Zoran Tatić (RS)

form.title: Register now
form.note: Note: For payments until Month 00, 2026. a more favorable registration fee is achieved. The registration fee can be paid via transaction account number:

fees.title: Fees
fees.mainText: In order for your registration fee to be in order, please fill out the application and make the payment by the scheduled deadline - 00 Month 2025 in case of early registration, and until 00 Month 2026 in case of late registration.
fees.invoiceNote: Please keep in mind that the invoice will be sent to you after the Congress, until the end of Month 2026.
fees.registrationFees: Registration fees for the BOOM Meeting are as follows:
fees.entitlements: Attendees with a duly paid BOOM Meeting registration fee after registration, and with a valid Meeting accreditation are entitled to: attend all Congress lectures and exhibitions, congress material, book of abstracts, certificate, coffee and lunch breaks.
fees.dailyNote: * Daily registration fee does not include congress material, book of abstracts, certificate, coffee and lunch breaks.
fees.importantNote: NOTE: Duly paid registration fee does not include attendance to the networking dinner and hotel accommodation.
fees.paymentInfo: The registration fee for BOOM Meeting can be paid via transaction account number:
